participant_1.background:

and , my best friend is cayden.

i love talking on the phone.

my name is todd.
I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.

content.text: Hi Todd, hope you are having a good day.
Hey, thanks. I am doing alright. How are you doing today?
Good, thank you. I am a bit tired but otherwise good.
I can relate to that. I've been busy with school lately.
Oh that's good. What are you studying?
I am studying psychology. I'm really interested in learning more about the mind.
That sounds really interesting. I have always been curious about the mind.
I think it's really important to understand how our minds work. It can help us to be better people.
I agree. I think it's important to be aware of our own biases and how they can affect our decisions.
I think that's a great way to put it. I think it's important to be open-minded and to be willing to learn new things.
I agree. I think it's important to keep an open mind and to be willing to change our minds when presented with new information.
I think that's a great way to live life
